content.detailedDescription: I took photos from inside a cruise ship, and i am so incredibly unimaginably stupid that when i saw reflections of lights from inside on the glass appear in my photos  'i could not believe my eyes. ' i do not know how i am capable of feeding or bathing myself. that is how stupid i am.
content.summary: Took photos of sunset while out to sea and captured two ufo's

content.detailedDescription: It all started approximately one to one and a half years prior i was sitting on back porch and noticed a light just hovering under the clouds but thought nothing of it. but i what cought my attention was when it was back the next day it was really bright and seemed to be alot lower then the stars it was always there i started to notice that it didn't follow the same flight pattern of the stars what i mean the stars that would be next to would move with time while this light would get furthe and further away in the same amount of time i watched it for a few more days when i thought to get the video camera out and record it. what igot when i zoomed in was a light with a sphere that kind of moved slightly.But the odd thing was it had an x going threw it so i focused on a star next to it and zoomed in and it had no similarities. i would watch it out of my window and one night i was saying in my head i know your there well it appeared 3 times in a week. my two sons saw it for themselves too
content.summary: Many nights of observing

content.detailedDescription: It all started approximately one to one and a half years prior i was sitting on back porch and noticed a light just hovering under the clouds but thought nothing of it. but i what cought my attention was when it was back the next day it was really bright and seemed to be alot lower then the stars it was always there i started to notice that it didn't follow the same flight pattern of the stars what i mean the stars that would be next to would move with time while this light would get furthe and further away in the same amount of time i watched it for a few more days when i thought to get the video camera out and record it. what igot when i zoomed in was a light with a sphere that kind of moved slightly.But the odd thing was it had an x going threw it so i focused on a star next to it and zoomed in and it had no similarities. i would watch it out of my window and one night i was saying in my head i know your there well it appeared 3 times in a week. my two sons saw it for themselves too
content.summary: Many nights of observing

content.detailedDescription:
My name is jim christie on march 19 2012 my girfriend and i went on a carnival cruise to the bahamas, on the last night out to sea when the sun was setting over the ocean i told my girlfriend to look at the sunset and i started taking pictures. i took a total of five photos and it was not until tonight that i looked at them on my cell phone while cleaning out old data. when i got to this picture i noticed the two lights and sent the photo to my computer to get a better look. i could not believe my eyes.

don't know what to do with this photo but i did not see anthing while  taking the photo.

please advise

jim christie
content.summary: Took photos of sunset while out to sea and captured two ufo's

content.detailedDescription: A little over thirty minutes ago i had a life changing experience. i was outside smoking a cigarette with a friend, who also saw the exact same thing as me; it wasn't that high  but yet somehow barely visible for such a huge object. v shaped, and yes i say again very, very big. the five lights underneath were dim, but that is was first brought my attention to the object. we started screaming because we have seen ufo's in the past but nothing more than fast beams of light far far away. this was right over my house,we were in my driveway when we saw it and it was traveling towards the brandon area. we moved to get a better view because trees were about to block the view, but then it was gone ! it was not flares or a group of helicopters because nothing flies like that, that low, that close without any noise that i know of. it was like things i have seen on tv before the huge blackish or maybe even see through type v shaped object. i wish i could tell you more, if you have any questions please do not hesitate, i want the truth.
content.summary: V shaped, very big, no noise. 5 lights underneath, barely visible then gone.

content.detailedDescription: I wanted a picture of the full moon, aimed the camera up at the moon, took the shot, then returned to my campsite.  this was 2 years ago.  i looked at the picture tonight, and saw the object, partly obscured by a 200 foot b.C. evergreen.  i was facing away from the only road, about 20 miles from any civilization, camping in manning park, and was standing on a river bank.  the object showed up in the photo, and that's about all i know.  when i saw the object, i knew the angle of the shot, and realized this could only be a ufo...There are even stars underneath the object, so it was very high in the sky.  i had the flash on, so the tree is illuminated, and the object is peeking out from a branch, but you can see two lights together on top, a third light on the bottom right, and a reflection of bronze or orange under the two top lights.  i was alone, camping, in the middle of nowhere, it was perfectly quiet, and this object showed up in my picture.  i was amazed, as it can only be a ufo when you understand the upward angle i shot with.  look at picture and the circled area.  very strange, and unlike anything that would ever be in the sky.  my father was a pilot and i often flew with him and know angles and distances.  this object should not be in the photo, but it is there, and is clear when zoomed in on the highlighted area.
content.summary: Like a top, with 3 white lights, two on top, 1 bottom right, reflected bronze

content.detailedDescription: At work and heard what felt like the loud sonic booms of a super low flying jet over head. from the sound of it, it felt like it was headed south. i posted it on fb. someone else mentioned seeing but a shadow from the 31st floor of a building. shortly after the noticed an apache helicopter.
content.summary: Heard what sounds like a super fast low flying jet, but it was too fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Downtown kingston, on.  april 13, 2012

outside talking on our deck, looking at the big dipper constellation above.

objects appeared.  2 lights linked in some way travelling very fast almost like a "shooting star" / falling meteor.  object followed a straight line. direction: nne

90 degrees above the horizon was the first moment of sighting... within 1 to 2 seconds it faded about 30-40 degrees above the horizon.

thought the object was natural - meteor falling through atmosphere or space junk falling out of orbit.

noticed that the object had 2 lights, travelling in tandem that did not fluctuate in distance to one another.

i called out, "i saw a 'shooting star,'" realizing quickly that falling meteors don't typically keep light up in near-perfect tandem.

as it faded away at around 30 degrees above the horizon, i understood that i needed to report the object to mufon, even though it was likely a meteor.
content.summary: 2 meteors falling to earth in perfect tandem, going from 90 deg to 40 deg in 1 second

content.detailedDescription:
Videoing at the monterey bay beach again, clear skys for 15-20 miles. with in the first 2-3 mintunes after setting up the video trypod this white light that look like just another star as i'm looking south it was moving so i begain to video it as it moved north along the shor line. i tryed to zoom in a few times but not able to make out any out line like a airplane,etc..It just keep on moveing slow it seem to stop  a few times. 
the video time shows this went on for about 6 mintunes long..It was very cool to watch this go on....This makes about the 5th one i have videoed them in the past few mounths and have info the mufon about this...Maybe we can but all of this together for the public to see...After there review.Etc. note-- large earth quakes around the world in the past mouths and maybe related?..Not sure but the timeing is odd.....
content.summary: At the beach night videoing this white light coming from the sw moving slow going n --ne

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:30 pm on april 12, while me and my son were returning home from his soccer practice we were discussing about the stars and especially the north star. as we reached home and got out of the vehicle my son pointed out to a brightly lit object above and asked me if that was a star and then we noticed it moving. i watched the brightly lit round object approaching at a steady speed from the north west corner of our house and immediately knew it wasn't a airplane, helicopter or a meteor as it had no blinking lights and it was flying too high to be a helicopter and i ran to grab my camera. didn't have time to attach my telephoto lens get my dslr so i grabbed my wife's nikon coolpix camera and the took a short video of the object. as i was taking the video, the bright light object which was flying very high paused for a few seconds above and then turned left and then continued on its steady path at good speed to the south west. the object didn't have any blinking lights except for the bright light on all sides and it even changed direction which made me sure that it was a ufo and not a airplane, helicopter or a meteorite. i felt shaky and so did my video but i felt good as i knew i had done my first ufo sighting. lost sight of the object as it went far away beyond eyesight.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Noticed a brightly lit white round shaped object in teh sky which moved from the north west direction to the south east and it hovered for about a few seconds above and then went left and followed its path down to the south east

content.detailedDescription: There were helicopters in the sky searching for this object that i caught on video, it flew very fast and i only saw it for a minute. the next day, the police were on the streets in my neighborhood asking strange and weird questions. it was covered up shortly after, its either an alien craft or a top secret military advanced flying object.
content.summary: Ufo flying tri orb, advanced aircraft

content.detailedDescription: On april 12, 2012 in the afternoon i was sitting outdoors on my patio. i heard a buzz or hum overhead. witnessed a dark round disc like uav object heading east away from my location, at an altitude of approximately 1500 ft at 45 mph. a cargo or military transport jet was also flying parallel at approximately 5000-10000 ft., slightly south and unusually low and out of normal flight paths. a police helicopter at a brisk speed was simultaneously flying at 800 ft heading west, in the opposite direction of the objects flight path, past my location. i observed the uav for several miles until it was too distant to see.
content.summary: Daytime sighting of disc like uav sighted in normal heights, san diego.

content.detailedDescription: Watching tv. noticed out of corner of eye, thought it was a plane. traveling way too fast to be a plane and disapeared as quickly as it was over. after seeing it i was in a state of shock and panic. scared out of my mind.
content.summary: Watching tv in home, saw bullet like object go across sky, green and blue lights then dissapeared as quickly as it started.

content.detailedDescription: About 9:00 pm stepped out back porch for a smoke as always looked up at the sky to find my stars that i follow throughout the night. looked to the east and saw what looked like a star moving across the sky, very high; higher than i've ever seen an airplane or jet. kept my eye on it & it looked almost like it went behind one of the big bright stars & kept going. i actually said out loud "holy cow, am i the only one seeing this right now?" i followed it until i could no longer see it. it seemed to be traveling in a straight line, even though my eyes moved off the light a couple of times as it was moving farther away, i was able to pick back up on it.  almost exactly 2 hours later @ about 11:10 i went back out & saw a 'falling star', a sort of curved trailing yellowish light that lasted about a second or two. was this a comet passing followed by a meteor passing through the atmosphere? i don't know, but i've never witnessed anything like this before. i look up at the stars all the time & have seen the sky from many different states & this is a first.  looking for answers on internet & found this web site from someone who had posted from pennsylvania.
content.summary: Bright light north to south in eastern sky extremely fast. at 1 point looked like it went behind a bright star.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the sunset from the balcony of a condo on the gulf of mexico.  as the sunset, i looked up to observe a sliver of the moon starting to appear.  then a reflection caught my eye to the right over the gulf.  at first i thought it was a kite from the beach.  then i realized it was farther out over the gulf and must be larger.  my wife and mother-in-law then saw it.  my mother in law went in to get binoculars and i went in and got my camera.  when i returned to the balcony the object had moved back toward the horizon.  i photograped it through my zoom lens.  it appeared to be horseshoe in shape.  it also had a pinkish orange glow to it that i did not see when i first observed it.  i took several pictures with my zoom lens and one without the zoom.

the object looked very different on the horizon than it did when i first say it.  when i first saw it it was very metalic and was difficult to focus on.  it almost apppeared as if it fluttered.  

it stayed on the horizon for quite sometime before it finally disappeared out of sight.  i never actually saw it move.  it just seem to "suck back" toward the horizon until it disappeared.

ihave seven digital pictures.  i only could attach three, and i don't know if they are the best, but they were the first three i took.
content.summary: Sighted silvery object over gulf from balcony it then "sucked" to horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the sunset from the balcony of a condo on the gulf of mexico.  as the sunset, i looked up to observe a sliver of the moon starting to appear.  then a reflection caught my eye to the right over the gulf.  at first i thought it was a kite from the beach.  then i realized it was farther out over the gulf and must be larger.  my wife and mother-in-law then saw it.  my mother in law went in to get binoculars and i went in and got my camera.  when i returned to the balcony the object had moved back toward the horizon.  i photograped it through my zoom lens.  it appeared to be horseshoe in shape.  it also had a pinkish orange glow to it that i did not see when i first observed it.  i took several pictures with my zoom lens and one without the zoom.

the object looked very different on the horizon than it did when i first say it.  when i first saw it it was very metalic and was difficult to focus on.  it almost apppeared as if it fluttered.  

it stayed on the horizon for quite sometime before it finally disappeared out of sight.  i never actually saw it move.  it just seem to "suck back" toward the horizon until it disappeared.

ihave seven digital pictures.  i only could attach three, and i don't know if they are the best, but they were the first three i took.
content.summary: Sighted silvery object over gulf from balcony it then "sucked" to horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
Object passed south facing window at about 10oclock and was no longer visible as it moved out of view at 3oclock from east to west behind trees
event occurred about 2030 hours est. probably a meteorite
content.summary: Blue yellow flame like front,yellow orangeflamelike tail

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving on i-94 driving west to bismarck an area that is rural. it was a clear night and the north dakota plains provide a large view of the sky. my friend grew up in a ranch in western nd and is very familiar with star constellations. while driving we noted a star that was blue, green,red. the brightness of the star was about the same as the other stars and twinkled like a star. my friend was interested in it because she said it was in a spot that didn't seem right to her. we looked at the star for about 10 minutes and while watching it took off in a very fast speed and was gone in a few seconds. it was  nw in the sky and headed slightly ne. we took off down the highway (which didn't have much traffic at this time) and didn't care if we got a ticket! there are 2 airbases in nd. one is in minot nd and one in grand forks nd. we were traveling from grand forks but at the time were 100 miles south of the minot afb and 30/40 miles east. the direction the ufo took off in would be toward the gfk ab if that was where they were going. that airbase would have been about 220 miles from where we were at the time. we debated about calling the air force about but thought they might think we were seeing things. as it turns out the nd air bases did get calls around that time about ufos. there was a woman in fargo nd about that time who claimed to be abducted by a ufo and a big story about it in the fargo forum. in the question about color being surface or other we didn't see specifically where the colors were in connection to the object.
content.summary: Clear night-starlike red.Green.Blue, white. stationary for a period of time then took offf very fast and disappeared in seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working on my website last night and decided to take a cigarette break.  i don't smoke in the house so i went outside to refresh myself in the cool new england air and drive another 'coffin nail' into my body.  it was about 2240 hrs. and there was some patchy cloud cover.

as i usually do in the evening when i go out for a smoke, i check out the stars; i was looking southernly from my apartment orions belt was at my 4 o'clock sky position.

as i'm looking up i picked up a satellite (object 1) tracking north due south and began to follow the pin dot sized light noting its steady movement.  as object 1 got to about 80 to 75 degrees above the horizon another pin dot sized light (object 2) entered my view only moving northeast due southwest.  these objects were a hands width apart in the night sky (4.5 - 5 inches).

what spawned this report is that object 2 stopped moving as if to allow object 1 to pass only to regain its trajectory after object 1 had proceeded beyond the (estimated) intersection point in the sky.

feeling confident that object 1 was infact a satellite i continued to observe object 2 moving southwesterly (i was pretty excited now) and noticed that object 2 'stuttered' in its flight path then abruptly changed direction and shot off in a due north direction at a perceived increased marked rate of speed.

i'm 47 y/o, was in the army as a m.P. and performed civilian law enforcment duties as well.  i'm now in the it field as a civilian.  i have seen pleanty of satellites in the sky numerous times and have never seen anything like this before.

object 1 maintained consistant speed and luminosity through out the event and i eventually lost sight of it due to my attention shifting to object 2.  object 2 maintained constant lumninosity but displayed the above mentioned movement anomalies:  stopping as if to avoid object 1, stuttering in its movment and abruptly changing direction and speed of movement.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Watching satellite when ufo bisected flight path and abruptly changed direction.

content.detailedDescription:
In 2001 lived in a farm house, in a wooded area, a voice in his head instructed him to come outside, he believes he was under some type of control, this voice led him to a ufo, he saw white lights spinning in a circle, craft was hovering then moved to the right, object went behind trees and was able to move on his own.
in 1995 his first sighting was about 4 pm, he was playing baseball, all of a sudden the sky opened up and a silver metallic disc appeared. object stopped on a dime, then shot straight down.

this report was summitted by stephen cox, chief field investigator for ny mufon on witnesses behalf. see attachment for more details.

believes he is experiencing the abduction phenomenon
1.	having blackouts
2.	memory loss
3.	saw ufo on property, disoriented
4.	close encounter with object, circle of lights rotating
5.	trance like states, unable to move
6.	uses meditation to communicate with alien life forms (during one of his meditations he asked for proof, he asked the voice to produce a praying mantus inside his house, the next morning paul found a praying mantus on his computer screen.
content.summary: 15 years of possible abduction/contactee

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were driving when out of no where a craft appeared suddenly out of thin air and hit super sonic speeds. the craft looked like a bullet and had bright green and white flames. the craft was moving faster than any human made air craft i have ever witnessed. it looked like it was flying at such high speeds that the craft actually started burning up green and white flames that were truly magnificent. the craft suddenly appeared and the trajectory was a curved descend. once we seent he craft it and it started to descend we lost sight of it due to the tree tops of our location. furthermore, i dialed my friends phone number and described to him what had just happened to me than suddenly my phone connection got distorted and went dead when i had full service (my friend's line was a lan line).
content.summary: My brother and i were driving and seen a bullet like craft appear out of no where and hit super sonic speeds on a descending curve. the flames were bright green and white.

content.detailedDescription: Last evening at 8:10 pm. watching tv. bright green object goes streaking across the sky. i was looking se. no tail like a shooting star. went down at an angle. saw the same green type in jan. of this year. that one went straight down. this one at an angle. upon seeing it i thought it was probably going to be an active orb night. decided to go outside and watch the sky. i didn't see anything else out of the ordinary at that point. between 9 and 9:30 i went back out and looked up and witnessed whitish glowing orbs. going in various directions. s to n. w to e. one was coming from the nw and it stopped and faded out. saw 3 of these within 15 mins. understand, i have been seeing these for years now, and have reported multiple times. they move across the sky faster than average jets travel. there were small planes in the area all during these events. right after the green abject flew by, i looked for planes  and spotted one moving in the same direction as green object. small plane. the pilot couldn't have missed seeing this as well. so in all 4 objects were seen by me. i went inside around 9:30 pm. had i stayed outside, i feel certain i would have seen more. i check mufon reports every day and when i saw all of the reports from all over pa, i just had to add to it. reporting these orbs over the past few years became redundant. trust me when i tell you they are way too low to be satellites. the green object at 8:10 was traveling e to w. i haven't been watching the sky at night since last fall, but after last nights events, my obsession is renewed.
content.summary: Active night over pa

content.detailedDescription: While traveling south on marsh hill rd in orange, ct, approaching rt 95 intersection, i saw through spotty rain clouds a bright object that was moving extremely quickly.  the blue and white lights illuminated the clouds as it travelled through them.  the angle of it's path looked like a meteor.  i watched the lights move across the horizon from left to right, disappearing into dense clouds and the tree line.  total time was approx 3-5 seconds.  a few seconds after i lost sight of it i saw a bright flash of light from the direction the lights were traveling, much like a camera flash. i saw this from the corner of eye as i was looking forward driving south.
content.summary: Blue-white lights seen through clouds, very fast, looked like meteor

content.detailedDescription: As me and my mother were driving on rt. 168 north on our way into hermitage, i observed a quick flash to my right. it created a huge ring shape. i'm not sure how to best describe it but it happened as fast as a lightening strike, but it was like a perfectly oval ring of bright white/blue light that became softer/faded towards the outside edges. immediately after seeing this as i'm asking my mom if she saw it, (she said no), the passenger side headlight starts to flicker. both headlights were replaced last week since we've been having problems with them. maybe it's unrelated, maybe not. but i've been watching the sky every single night for almost a year now and this is the 4th unexplainable thing i've witnessed. (the other 3 had multiple witnesses). if anyone has seen anything similar, or is watching the skies in western pa, please let me know. i'd love to know other people know what i'm talking about. thank you.
content.summary: Big circular flash covering field

content.detailedDescription: It was 7:30pm i was going to the car to get my backpack to do my homework and i felt a strange pull to look up into the sky and when i did i saw three black triangles flying above me no sound no jet stream no nothing let me tell you it scared me like heck so i wnet in my house to get my orion telescope to view the event but when i came back i saw they where heading ws so i call my friend and he said he just saw them to and then i tried to get him to take a picture but he didnt have his ipod touch with him at the time and after that i havent saw it since but i have been looking up to the night sky more often just hoping i would be able to see it one more time....
content.summary: There was 3 black triangles flying over my house with 3 white lights and a red in the middle

content.detailedDescription: I observed a disc-shaped object which appeared over my neighbor's house in back of me.  it was fairly low in the sky and it stopped moving and then totally disappeared.  the object was glowing and was a neon green color with white lights on it.  it was approximately 8:00 p.M.  i did not spot any further sightings that evening.
content.summary: Ufo spotted in horsham, pa on april 12, 2012 at 20:00 hours

content.detailedDescription: While driving home with a co-worker at approximately 8:10pm on april 12 2012 in lawrenceville/trenton nj part of rt 295 south right before the 195 intersection.  we saw what looked like two bright neon blue oval type lights attached to some kind of object and it was traveling super fast - like a meteor falling to earth -  the object became invisible while in our site (it did not travel below a tree line) - it just disappeared.
content.summary: Object with 2 bright blue neon lights movement similar to meteor

content.detailedDescription: It came in fast like a meteorite but no trail behind it. then in under 1/5th of a second it accelerated back into the sky leaving a beam like trail as it went up into the sky in a faster then lighting speed. it happened so fast that if i was to blink i wouldn't of seen it. i was looking towards windsor canada from detroit michigan around 12 at night smoking a cigarette
content.summary: Blue/white glowing surface bulletshaped object shot across in an instant

content.detailedDescription: Seen a light as i left my hm at 9:55pm pulsating purplish,red light hoovering over i17-thunderbird traveling south. no aircraft i know can move up,down sideways zoom here & there. i observed it for 5 min with my sister on the phone. i noticed a helicoper was getting close to it but the object tried moving away from helicopter, the ufo finally started moving south in a swirly motion.  i wonder if the traffic accident that happened at i17 & thunderbird had anything to do with the object. whats going on? there had to be tons of witnesses. neat but scary
content.summary: Purplish/red light hoovering over i17-thunderbird ave traveling south

content.detailedDescription: High pitch humming started all around us at 1128 pm. it stopped after around two minutes. everyone is still in edge. it came from nowhere, but was everywhere.
content.summary: Loud erie humming from everywhere
